name: Logout Roulette
author: Brad Parbs

sections.description:
On every admin page load, there’s a 1 in 10 chance you’ll be logged out. Also hides the plugin from the Plugins menu for all users but the one who activated it.

Some of our amazing reviews:

“It does exactly what’s advertised. The code is very lightweight and clean. Fantastic work!”

“I look at a million plugins every day. This was the best one I’ve had to review in all of 2013.”

“I’ve been looking for a plugin like this for ages now – this one does the job and does it perfectly. Installing this on all my client sites, right now. Thanks!”
sections.installation: Upload the the plugin to your site and activate it. Hopefully you don’t get logged out!
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • better randomness

1.1.0

  • Hides plugin from admin plugins menu except for the user that activates it
  • Fixes random number to actually be 1 in 10

1.0.1

  • LOLZ SEMICOLON

1.0.0

  • inital release

short_description: On every admin page load, there's a 1 in 10 chance you'll be logged out. Are you ready to try your luck?`
